title: it is an ill wind (that blows nobody any good)

data.释义: An idiom said to show that even a very bad situation must have some good results
data.例句:
"What a day! I left my keys in my apartment, slipped on stairs, and my boss has been so mean to me the whole day!"
"Oh no. But I believe the saying, it is an ill wind, there must have been SOMETHING good, right?"
"Yeah, I won a lottery!"
data.备注: Try to link this back to Chinese four-character idioms.
